misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi, a member of Kullo Golf Club, is a consistent presence at the Hector Trophée, having competed in the 2022, 2024, and 2025 editions of the tournament.  While he's yet to claim either the coveted Hector Trophée itself or the individual Victor trophy, his dedication and steady play year after year demonstrate a commitment to excellence.

A fascinating aspect of Ossi's game is his infrequent use of the driver. This unique approach, while raising some eyebrows amongst more traditionalists, has clearly been effective enough to maintain his competitiveness in this prestigious tournament.  His skill lies in his precision and strategic course management, a style that makes him a formidable opponent despite his less conventional approach.

It will be interesting to see if Ossi can finally break through and claim a victory in this year's Hector Trophée. His consistent performance suggests he's not far off, and he may well surprise many with a strong showing this year.
